meanings.definition: Remaining after the greater part or quantity has gone.
meanings.sent2: The cake had some residuals crumbs on the plate.
meanings.sent3: The residuals pieces of paper made a tiny trail.
meanings.sent4: The residuals memories lingered like faint echoes.
meanings.sent5: The residuals scent of flowers filled the room softly.

meanings.definition: An amount remaining after a deduction, charge, or allowance has been made.
meanings.sent1: She saved the residuals money for a rainy day.
meanings.sent2: The residuals of the meal were packed for later.
meanings.sent3: The residuals coins jingled in his pocket cheerfully.
meanings.sent4: The residuals time left before the deadline was short.
meanings.sent5: The residuals energy in her was enough to keep going.

meanings.sent1: The residuals of the chemical reaction were carefully disposed of.
meanings.sent2: The residuals of the soap left a clean smell.
meanings.sent3: The residuals oil on the pan made a rainbow sheen.
meanings.sent4: The residuals ink on the paper formed intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: The residuals sugar in the tea made it sweet.
